com.imi.jist3d.render
Class VectorMatrixUtils

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.imi.jist3d.render.VectorMatrixUtils
public final class VectorMatrixUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Shawn Kendall, IMI, LLC Current mostly adpated from demos source and modified where needed for order or possible optimizations (such as removing loops) vector.x = (float)Math.sin(Math.toRadians(x)); vs. vector3.x = VecMath.sin(vector3.x); ~3.15 times faster
